name: ASU Global
description:
The beginning of an exciting MMORPG.
Start a new adventure in the world of A.S.U.

▶ Game Introduction
Here is a world that needs your help.
The dark god Exilis is about to destroy the world with a powerful force.
Anitas, the god of light, fights against Exilis, but lacks strength.
We need your help to save the world from destruction.
Your help goes a long way in saving the world.
Join now.





▶ Characteristic
- Stylish MMORPG
- Party play with a combination of 5 unique classes.
- Battle with huge and powerful field boss monsters.
- Guardian system that gets stronger the more you combine it.
- Guild system that gets stronger as you grow.
